title: Can the front (selfie) camera mirror effect be corrected? (ie:flip L/R so printing can be read)
content:
I only recently noticed this as I don't take many selfies but the image should be reversed left to right to give the correct perspective. If you're wearing a shirt with printing, it will be reversed like looking in a mirror.
Many friends with iPhones don't seem to have this problem probably because Apple just made sure to correct it.
I haven't found a L/R flip correction in Google photos app.
